title: That's My Candy
overview: The story is about Guy and Jing, a couple who's been together for quite some time. Both have their own responsibilities and barely have time to see each other. They had a huge fight and Jing wanted to break up, but Guy won't allow it. He tried everything to make up to Jing, but it's not easy. An uncle whom Guy had once saved his life, gave him a magical candy that would help him make amends with Jing.
